details.title: Senior Node.js Developer
details.name: Nelson Antunes
profile: Developer with experience in back-end development, using NodeJS (JavaScript and Typescript), .NET (C#), and databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MSSQL. I also have knowledge in front-end development, working with React, Redux and jQuery. I have skills in integration and problem-solving, utilizing tools like RabbitMQ and Ansible. Additionally, I have experience in application monitoring using tools like Dynatrace, Grafana, and Datadog. I am always seeking new challenges to continue growing professionally.

company.legal_name: FLASH TECNOLOGIA E INSTITUICAO DE PAGAMENTO LTDA

long_description: In my role, I have honed my expertise in technologies such as Node.js, NestJS, (using both Javascript and Typescript), and ReactJS, and have been involved in structuring and enhancing system architecture using principles like Clean Architecture, Event Driven Architecture, and Domain-Driven Design (DDD). As a developer, I not only leverage my technical skills but also actively share knowledge with my team.

company.legal_name: ZOOP TECNOLOGIA & INSTITUICAO DE PAGAMENTO S.A.

long_description: I worked on the Process Automation team, performing the development of RPA applications to be integrated into Zeev, using C#, Javascript, Postgres, MongoDB, MySQL, and AWS resources such as Secret Manager, Parameter Store, S3 Bucket, among others.

company.legal_name: NEON PAGAMENTOS SA INSTITUICAO DE PAGAMENTO

long_description: Responsible for monitoring, maintaining and improving existing .NET applications as well as creating new ones, using technologies such as .NET (C#), RabbitMQ, MSSQL; Identifying and troubleshooting issues using Dynatrace, Grafana and support tickets to improve the financial services;

company.legal_name: EVENTS SERVICOS VIAGEM E TURISMO LTDA

long_description: Creation and maintenance of the company's various products/applications, using node.js (Javascript and Typescript) on the back-end, React on the front end and databases on mongodb and MySQL; CI/CD configuration and management using SemaphoreCI and Bitbucket Pipelines; Configuration, deployment and management of servers, buckets, databases and applications in various cloud providers (AWS and Google Cloud);

education.description: Exchange Student sponsored by the Brazilian Federal Government through 'Science Without Borders' sandwich course initiative.

education.course: Associate Degree in Computer Systems Networking and Telecommunications
Associate Degree in Computer Systems Analysis

school.name: Faculdade de Tecnologia de São Paulo - FATEC-SP
Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia de São Paulo - IFSP

long_description: As part of the Science Without Borders sandwich course initiative, sponsored by the Brazilian Government, I worked as an intern at Big Data University.

There, I was able to help envision and develop a do-it-yourself home surveillance system using a Raspberry Pi (along with it's camera module), some IBM technology (Cloudant + Bluemix), Python and Node.js.
During the project my team and I wrote this article that talks about the first prototype: [URL]https://bit.ly/3CnrhVE[URL]
